mapper.update: UPDATE article SET wid=#{wid}, catid=#{catid}, a_title=#{title}, a_intro=#{intro}, a_content=#{content}, a_recommand=#{recommand}, a_read_count=#{readCount}, a_like_count=#{likeCount}, a_dislike_count=#{dislikeCount}, a_update_time=#{updateTime}, a_is_complete=#{isComplete}, a_is_writer_show=#{isWriterShow}, a_is_censored=#{isCensored} WHERE aid=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM article WHERE a_is_censored=1 ORDER BY a_update_time DESC LIMIT #{quantity}

SELECT article.aid AS id, article.a_title AS title, article.a_intro, article.a_content AS content, article.a_recommand AS recommand, article.a_read_count AS read_count, article.a_like_count AS like_count, article.a_dislike_count AS dislike_count, article.a_update_time AS update_time, article.a_is_complete AS is_complete, article.a_is_writer_show AS is_writer_show, article.a_is_censored AS is_censored, writer.wid AS wid, writer.w_pen_name AS writer_name, category.catid AS catid, category.cat_name AS category_name FROM article LEFT JOIN writer ON article.wid=writer.wid LEFT JOIN category ON article.catid=category.catid ORDER BY article.aid ASC

SELECT article.aid AS id, article.a_title AS title, article.a_intro, article.a_content AS content, article.a_recommand AS recommand, article.a_read_count AS read_count, article.a_like_count AS like_count, article.a_dislike_count AS dislike_count, article.a_update_time AS update_time, article.a_is_complete AS is_complete, article.a_is_writer_show AS is_writer_show, article.a_is_censored AS is_censored, writer.wid AS wid, writer.uid AS writer_uid, writer.w_pen_name AS writer_name, category.catid AS catid, category.cat_name AS category_name FROM article LEFT JOIN writer ON article.wid=writer.wid LEFT JOIN category ON article.catid=category.catid WHERE article.aid=#{id}

SELECT article.aid AS id, article.a_title AS title, article.a_intro AS intro, article.a_content AS content, article.a_recommand AS recommand, article.a_read_count AS read_count, article.a_like_count AS like_count, article.a_dislike_count AS dislike_count, article.a_update_time AS update_time, article.a_is_complete AS is_complete, article.a_is_writer_show AS is_writer_show, article.a_is_censored AS is_censored, writer.wid AS wid, writer.w_pen_name AS writer_name, category.catid AS catid, category.cat_name AS category_name FROM article LEFT JOIN writer ON article.wid = writer.wid LEFT JOIN category ON article.catid = category.catid WHERE article.a_is_censored=0 AND article.a_is_complete=1 ORDER BY article.a_update_time ASC

SELECT article.aid AS id, article.a_title AS title, article.a_intro AS intro, article.a_content AS content, article.a_recommand AS recommand, article.a_read_count AS read_count, article.a_like_count AS like_count, article.a_dislike_count AS dislike_count, article.a_update_time AS update_time, article.a_is_complete AS is_complete, article.a_is_writer_show AS is_writer_show, article.a_is_censored AS is_censored, writer.wid AS wid, writer.w_pen_name AS writer_name, category.catid AS catid, category.cat_name AS category_name FROM article LEFT JOIN writer ON article.wid = writer.wid LEFT JOIN category ON article.catid = category.catid WHERE article.a_is_censored=-1 OR article.a_is_censored=1 ORDER BY article.a_update_time DESC
SELECT category.catid AS id, category.cat_name AS name, COUNT( article.aid ) AS article_count FROM category LEFT JOIN article ON article.catid=category.catid GROUP BY category.catid
SELECT tag.tagid AS id, tag.tag_name AS name, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM tag LEFT JOIN tag_map ON tag.tagid=tag_map.tagid GROUP BY tag.tagid
SELECT tag_map.tagid AS id, tag.tag_name AS name FROM tag_map LEFT JOIN tag ON tag_map.tagid=tag.tagid WHERE tag_map.aid=#{id}

SELECT censor_record.aid AS article_id, censor_record.uid AS auditor_id, censor_record.cr_is_pass AS is_pass, censor_record.cr_time AS time, article.a_title AS article_title, user.u_name AS auditor_name FROM censor_record, article, user WHERE article.aid=censor_record.aid AND user.uid=censor_record.uid AND censor_record.aid=#{aid} ORDER BY time DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT COUNT(aid) AS uncensored_article_amount FROM article WHERE a_is_censored=0 AND a_is_complete=1 )amount1, (SELECT COUNT(aid) AS censored_article_amount FROM article WHERE a_is_censored IN (-1, 1) )amount2, (SELECT COUNT(cmtid) AS reported_comment_amount FROM comments_report WHERE comments_report.cmtr_is_handle=0 )amount3

SELECT clc.clcid AS id,clc.aid AS aid,clc.clc_create_date AS create_date, a.a_title AS title,a.a_intro AS intro,a_update_time AS update_time, w.w_pen_name AS writer_name FROM collection AS clc,article AS a,writer AS w WHERE clc.uid=#{uid} AND a.aid=clc.aid AND w.wid=a.wid ORDER BY clc_create_date DESC
